teacher_info.about_teacher:
I’m a really patient, talkative and creative teacher. I’m ready to support you during our language journey! 
My lessons = comfort + efficiency 
I’m open to any questions and ideas, heyyy don't be shy :) I’m very flexible, so your language-goals are a priority for me.
“We need to understand how this machine works”. During our lessons, I don’t give you fragmentary knowledge, I try to build or complete the language functioning system in your mind.
You can always write to me and ask what interests you. By the way, are you ready to get funny pictures in our chat? :D
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I offer two types of lesson: SPEAKING PRACTICE and GRAMMAR (detailed information in the lesson description***). I like to visualize texts, so I often use graphics tablet or whiteboard and markers in my lessons. It definitely won't be boring! 
Usually we discuss the lesson plan, but if you just want to talk, we can have an improvisation-lesson. You know, your emotions and attitude are really important, so if you feel something is wrong, please let me know.
Thank you for your trust. I can't wait to see you!

course_info.trial_description:
Привет! 
Пробный урок посвящен нашему знакомству. В ходе беседы мы обсудим цели и задачи обучения. Подберем план урока, который будет Вам наиболее полезен и эффективен.

Hello!
Trial lesson is dedicated to our meeting. During the conversation, we will discuss the goals and objectives of the training. We will select a lesson plan that will be most useful and effective for you.

pro_course_detail.title: 🗣 SPEAKING PRACTICE/ РАЗГОВОРНАЯ ПРАКТИКА
pro_course_detail.description:
Speaking practice is one of the best ways to learn a language. During the lesson, I write down new words and phrases in a file that I send you after the lesson. We can talk about any topic: traditions, culture, food, hobbies, feelings and emotions, travel, education, motivation! 
The hardest part is getting started. You shouldn't worry about silence during the dialogue because I will support you and also ask questions! I’m a very attentive person, and it’s important for me that you feel comfortable! 
+ For each lesson, I prepare a text, video or language game to develop your speaking and listening skills! 
Let’s goooo :D
 

Разговорная практика - это один из лучших способов изучения языка. В процессе урока я записываю новые слова и выражения в файл, который отправляю тебе после урока. Мы можем разговаривать на любые темы: традиции, культура, еда, хобби, чувства и эмоции, путешествия, образование, мотивация! Самое сложное - это начать. Ты можешь не переживать за тишину во время диалога, потому что я буду помогать тебе и поддерживать, а также задавать вопросы! Я очень внимательный человек, и мне важно, чтобы ты чувствовал себя комфортно! 
+ Для каждого урока данного формата я готовлю текст, видео или языковую игру, чтобы развивать твои навыки говорения и аудирования! 
Поехалиии :D

pro_course_detail.title: 👩‍💻  6 (ALL) RUSSIAN CASES + VOCABULARY + homework (optional)
pro_course_detail.description:
Russian is an inflectional language (word endings always change depending on the meaning and position) so choosing the right ending of the case system of nouns, pronouns and adjectives is one of the main problems that are encountered by foreigners learning Russian. What will we do? 
--- THE SITUATION: you know some Russian words in the Nominative case from dictionaries, songs, movies, even from Google translator (она - she, девушка - a girlfriend, мой - my, друг - a friend) but you don't know how to connect them, how to compose a phrase or sentence in Russian (она девушка моЕГО другА - she's my friend's girlfriend). It means this course is for you! 
But don't be scared because I'm ready to answer all your questions and help you!
--- The main questions are:
1) WHY DO WE USE THIS CASE? *meanings*
2) WHEN DO WE USE THIS CASE? *helper words*
3) WHAT DOES THIS CASE LOOK LIKE? *formula*
I use scripts, audio and video formats because I LOVE TO VISUALIZE INFORMATION. My diagrams and tables will help you remember new rules and words easier (by the way, this is a great exercise for your vocabulary!!!)
I'm looking forward to our meeting. Hope to see you soon :D


Русский — это флективный язык (окончания слов меняются в зависимости от значения и позиции), поэтому выбор правильного окончания в падежной системе существительных, местоимений и прилагательных — одна из основных проблем, с которыми сталкиваются иностранцы, изучающие русский язык. Что же мы будем делать?
Не пугайся, потому что я готова тебе помочь и ответить на все вопросы!
Главные вопросы:
1) ПОЧЕМУ МЫ ИСПОЛЬЗУЕМ ЭТОТ ПАДЕЖ? *значения*
2) КОГДА МЫ ИСПОЛЬЗУЕМ ЭТОТ ПАДЕЖ? *вспомогательные слова*
3) КАК ВЫГЛЯДИТ ЭТОТ ПАДЕЖ? *формула*
Я использую скрипты, а также аудио и видео форматы, потому что ОБОЖАЮ ВИЗУАЛИЗИРОВАТЬ ИНФОРМАЦИЮ. Мои материалы помогут тебе легче запоминать новые правила и слова (кстати, это отличная тренировка для твоего вокабуляра!)
Я с нетерпением жду нашей встречи! :D

teacher_info.intro:
Я родилась в небольшом сибирском городе Мегион (попробуй найти на карте). Сейчас живу недалеко от Москвы вместе с мужем, дочкой и двумя котами.
По образованию я экономист, работала маркетологом, но ушла из "офиса" в творческий фриланс в 2016 году. Сейчас создаю картины и иллюстрации в необычном "мозаичном" стиле. Увлекаюсь чтением книг, йогой и медитациями. 

I was born in the small Siberian town Megion (try to find it). Now I live nearby Moscow with my husband, daughter and two cats.
I am an economist, who worked in marketing and quit "the office" for creative freelance in 2016. Now I create paintings and illustrations in "mosaic" style. I love reading books, yoga and meditations.
teacher_info.short_signature: Conversational Russian on any topic easy and fun with very gentle and talkative native speaker

teacher_info.about_teacher:
Люблю делать процесс изучения чего-то сложного (как русский язык) веселым и простым. 
Я умею мягко корректировать произношение, форму слов, ударение. Если вам это не подходит, можем разговаривать без исправлений, ведь даже слушая носителя языка, вы возьмете в свою речь много полезного.
У моих студентов нет домашних заданий, но мы используем время на уроке максимально эффективно.

I like to make the process of learning something complex (like Russian) fun and simple. 
I'm able to gently correct pronunciation, form of words, stress. But we can talk without any corrections, if you like.
My students don't have homework, but we use our time in class as efficiently as possible.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Разговорная практика очень полезна и важна в процессе обучения. Это больше, чем просто small talk!
Обычно у меня нет четкого плана, и я выстраиваю беседу спонтанно. Точно также я и сама общаюсь с людьми. 
Студенты говорят, что со мной легко, потому что им не нужно думать о теме и можно сосредоточиться только на русском языке.

Conversational practice is very useful and important in the learning process. This is more than just a small talk!
Usually I don't have a clear conversation plan, and I build it spontaneously. That's how I communicate with people myself. 
Students say that it's easy to talk with me because they don't need to think about the topic and can focus only on Russain.

course_info.trial_description:
Давай проверим нашу совместимость для успешного изучения русского языка и приятного общения в процессе! Расскажу о себе, узнаю твои цели, знания языка и... вперед!

Let's check our compatibility for learning Russian and having fun during the lesson! I'll tell you about myself, find out your goals, language level and... onward!

pro_course_detail.title: Общий урок русского языка / General Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Важно: я не учу "основам" русского языка (алфавит, грамматика), а помогаю улучшить ваши знания с помощью диалогов на разные темы. Спасибо за понимание!

На уроках мы можем вести разговоры на любые темы, исправить произношение, ударения, читать небольшие тексты. Могу проверять ваши письменные тексты, вместе готовиться к презентациям, обсуждать статьи, фильмы, расширять словарный запас. Объясняю значение непонятных слов, их этимологию, сленг.

Important: I do not teach "basic" Russian (alphabet, grammar), but help to improve your knowledge with dialogues on various topics. Thank you for understanding!

During the lessons, we can have conversations on any topic, correct pronunciation, stress, read small texts. I can check your written texts, help to prepare for presentations, discuss articles, movies, expand your vocabulary, etc. I explain the meaning of incomprehensible words, their etymology, slang.

pro_course_detail.title: Разговорный русский язык / Conversational Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Чем больше практики, тем лучше ваши разговорные навыки! Понимать русский язык это ещё не значит уметь легко говорить на нём.
Дам вам возможность свободно рассуждать на любые интересные темы, перебивая своими вопросами и историями из жизни)) 
Обычно мы со студентами общаемся без заданий и предварительной подготовки. Можем скорректировать звуки стихами и скороговорками, поиграть в игры на объяснение слов и т.д. Расскажу значение непонятных слов и фраз, расширю ваш словарный запас.

The more you practice, the better your conversational skills! Understanding Russian doesn't mean being able to speak it easily.
I'll give you the opportunity to talk freely on any interesting topics, interrupting with my questions and life stories)) 
Usually I communicate with my students without assignments and preliminary preparation. We can correct your sounds with verses and tongue twisters, play games to explain words, etc. I'll tell you about the meaning of incomprehensible words and phrases, expand your vocabulary.

pro_course_detail.title: Чтение книг на русском языке / Reading Russian
pro_course_detail.description:
Важно: я не учу русскому языку с нуля (алфавит, грамматика), а помогаю улучшить ваши знания при помощи чтения интересных вам книг. Спасибо за понимание!

Если у тебя есть книга, которую хотелось бы прочитать, но одному это делать страшно или сложно, то давай почитаем её вместе! Я люблю книги. Помогу с произношением, ударениями, объясню слова и выражения. 
Чтение - это отличный способ визуально запоминать слова, грамматику и целые фразы.

Important: I do not teach "basic" Russian (alphabet, grammar), but help to improve your knowledge by reading books you're interested in. Thank you for understanding!

If you have a book that you would like to read, but it's scary or difficult to do it alone, then let's read it together! I love books. I'll help with pronunciation, stress, explain words and expressions. 
Reading is a great way to visually memorize words, grammar, and whole phrases.

teacher_info.intro: Привет!  Меня зовут Настя (Анастасия), я родилась и выросла в России, в городе Омске и мой родной язык – русский. Я учусь в Омском Государственном университете (ОмГУ) на факультете иностранных языков. Помимо русского языка, я знаю английский язык (В2) и испанский (А2). Я люблю изучать иностранные языки, культуру разных стран и народов, а также с удовольствием поделюсь знаниями о русском языке и культуре России!
teacher_info.about_me: Привет!  Меня зовут Настя (Анастасия), я родилась и выросла в России, в городе Омске и мой родной язык – русский. Я учусь в Омском Государственном университете (ОмГУ) на факультете иностранных языков. Помимо русского языка, я знаю английский язык (В2) и испанский (А2). Я люблю изучать иностранные языки, культуру разных стран и народов, а также с удовольствием поделюсь знаниями о русском языке и культуре России!
teacher_info.about_teacher: Несмотря на то, что я ещё не закончила университет, у меня уже есть богатый опыт преподавания русского языка для людей с разным уровнем: от самых начинающих и до продвинутых. В качестве моих учеников – люди со всего мира: с Испании, Америки, Ирана, Эквадора, Бразилии, Вьетнама и тд. Despite the fact that I have not yet graduated from the university, I already have a rich experience of teaching Russian to people with different levels: from the most beginners to advanced. My students are people from all over the world: from Spain, America, Iran, Ecuador, Brazil, Vietnam, etc.
teacher_info.teaching_style: Я считаю, что самое важное в преподавании это уметь найти индивидуальный подход к ученику. Также я убеждена, что системный подход к изучению языка составляет значительную часть процесса обучения. На уроке я использую различные учебники и видео и  аудио. I believe that the most important thing in teaching is to be able to find an individual approach to the student. I am also convinced that a systematic approach to language learning is a significant part of the learning process. In the lesson, I use various textbooks and video and audio.

course_info.trial_description:
Пробный урок - это отличная возможность познакомиться, узнать больше об языковом уровне студента и его интересах/ увлечениях. Во время пробного урока подберём материалы для последующих занятий!
A trial lesson is a great opportunity to get acquainted, learn more about the student's language level and his interests/ hobbies. During the trial lesson, we will select materials for subsequent classes!

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for beginners
pro_course_detail.description:
Курс "Русский язык для начинающих" подойдёт для тех, кто только начал своё путешествие в мир русского языка и хочет разобраться в основах. В этом курсе мы разберём фонетику,  базовую грамматику и научимся говорить на несложные темы!
Russian Russian for Beginners course is suitable for those who have just started their journey into the world of the Russian language and want to understand the basics. In this course, we will analyze phonetics, basic grammar and learn how to speak on simple topics!

pro_course_detail.title: Intermediate and upper- intermediate
pro_course_detail.description:
Курс подойдёт для тех, кто продолжает изучать русский язык. В этом курсе мы углублённо изучим грамматику, расширим словарный запас, улучшим навыки аудирования и научимся более бегло говорить на различные темы! 
The course is suitable for those who continue to study Russian. In this course, we will study grammar in depth, expand our vocabulary, improve our listening skills and learn to speak more fluently on various topics!

pro_course_detail.title: Conversation Practice
pro_course_detail.description:
Этот курс подойдёт для любителей поговорить на различные интересные темы и кто хочет улучшить навык общения. Разговор на русском языке это отличная возможность показать свои знания, практиковать грамматику и расширить словарный запас.
This course is suitable for those who like to talk about various interesting topics and who want to improve their communication skills. Speaking in Russian is a great opportunity to show your knowledge, practice grammar and expand your vocabulary.

teacher_info.intro:
* Hello, my dear Russian learners! Здравствуйте, мои дорогие ученики!

I'm Julia, a native Russian speaker, certified Russian teacher, and horse lover! I've been traveling around the world and teaching online full-time since 2016.

_________________________

I offer 1-on-1 or group Russian lessons tailored to your needs or the needs of your company, and corporate lessons with a focus on team building.


*** Tailored Russian lessons ***
I’ll help you design your own learning program to fill in your knowledge gaps and strengthen your language skills. We could work on speaking, listening, reading, writing (and even handwriting!), grammar, accent reduction, and so on. All levels are welcome!

pro_course_detail.title: Students 2022 🏠 Tailored lessons A1-С2 🙋 pack of 10
pro_course_detail.description:
✌ Hey, my dear Russian learners! 

🏠 Tailored lessons A1-С2 🙋 pack of 10

My lessons are always tailored to your needs. It means, at first, I'm looking for your knowledge gaps and then we think together how to fill them in the most effective way. We're not going to talk about obvious things, we will cover only material you really need to improve your language skills.

I always try to do my best to give you high-quality feedback based on your knowledge and blanks. 

Before our lesson, please write some words about your learning background and goals. Let me know what you would like to learn and if you'd like to have homework. 


🎧 Phonetic course for beginners 👍 pack of 10

This course is suitable for you if you've just started to learn Russian. I recommend you to invest a bit of your time to build a strong foundation for developing your Russian skills and avoid lots of mistakes in the future. It's definitely worth it! 
Phonetics is extremely important and necessary for listening comprehension and speaking skills:
✅ бить (beat) - быть (to be) - completely different words. 
✅ мат (mat) - мать (mother) - мять (crumple)
✅ идёт (he/she goes) - идиот (idiot)
Phonetics is directly related to grammar, e.g. you need its help when forming plurals of nouns, decline nouns, conjugate verbs and so on. 
 
I will help you learn the Russian alphabet, basic Russian phrases, rules of pronunciation and spelling and get you reading! Usually, it takes about 10 lessons. If your language is not so close to Russian as English, it may take longer.
 
Also, I will provide you with recordings of correct pronunciation and other materials you may need.
 
Talk to you soon! До скорого!
If you have any questions, just message me.

pro_course_detail.title: 🎁 Russian literature and cinema B2-C2 & 🙋 Exam preparation / Special needs
pro_course_detail.description:
🙋 Exam preparation 
 
I will help you create a learning program to cover every single piece of grammar you need to pass your test and not forget about something important. Please let me know what kind of exam you're planning to take, what requirements are, how much time we have and how many lessons you would like to take. I will try to do my best.
 


🎁 Russian literature and cinema B2-C2
Привет, мои дорогие студенты!
 
Этот пакет для студентов среднего и продвинутого уровня. 
Если вам нравится читать книги, и вы любите размышлять над рассказами, романами и стихами русских писателей или хотите посмотреть и обсудить самые популярные русские фильмы, то эти уроки для вас. 
Программу курса мы строим вместе с вами, исходя из того, что вам нравится, но на базе самых известных литературных произведений. 
Кроме того, мы можем читать стихи, интерпретировать их и работать над выразительным чтением: над произношением, интонацией и правильной подачей эмоций.

I offer you a variety of materials: texts, videos, audios, tests, exercises, pictures, tables, and schemes. Be sure you will learn a lot =)
Please text me what you would like help with and ask questions you have.
 
See you soon! До скорого!
 
* Please, note amount of lessons depends on your goals and learning speed.

Hi!
My name is Oksana.I have a teaching degree in English, Russian and Ukrainian languages.I know how to teach a new language effectively. My native languages are Ukrainian and Russian. I have an extensive experience (8 years) in working with students of different levels. 
My favourite topics are culture, travelling, relationships, life experience, career achievements.
Меня зовут Оксана. У меня есть педагогическое образование по преподаванию английского, русского и украинского языков. Я знаю как эффективно научить новому языку. Мои родные языки украинский и русский.  меня большой опыт работы (8 лет) со студентами разных уровней.

teacher_info.about_teacher:
My teaching methods include conventional and non-conventional approaches. 
I teach my lovely students Grammar and Speaking, Listening, Reading and Writing. I show them all subtleties of pronunciation and reduction. 
A typical lesson could consist of the following or more: 
- In every lesson you will learn a new vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation tips.
- You will begin reading books and speak your ideas fluently. 
- Your conversation and listening skills will improve and self-confidence will grow.
- I will use visual aids to make our lesson much more effective.

*I will make a learning plan that meets your needs and goals.
*If you have regular lessons with me, you will improve quickly.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
I build a personal relationship with my students in an enjoyable way. I provide them with clear grammar rules, vivid examples and understandable conversations to make learning interesting. 

Learning languages with me is like a journey to an amazing fairytale where I help you open up a new side of your personality and discover passion for a new language forever. I will do my best to make our lessons fruitful.

I am ready to help you and see you at the schedule soon! If you want to learn more about the lesson, please message me.

NOTE:
•All cancellations must be made according to the Italki policy.

pro_course_detail.title: Business English
pro_course_detail.description:
If you've decided to move to an English-speaking country for a job, and you want to make sure you are able to become a productive member of your new society! You're in luck, because this course will teach you how to communicate effectively in a business.

In our first lesson, we will work together to determine your specific objectives so that you could be sure to improve. 

This course offers expressions, idioms and vocabulary, role plays, case studies, grammar and practice using the target language. 

You will be able to introduce yourself, make small talks, talk about what you do, talk about your achievements, company, your products and services, write Emails.

You will learn how to make polite requests, saying no politely, greetings, accept and decline invitations, etc). 

You will learn to describe your job functions, procedures, making suggestions and giving feedback.

The course is designed for:
pre-intermediate, 
intermediate and
upper-intermediate students

pro_course_detail.title: Informal Tutoring
pro_course_detail.description:
This course is suitable for intermediate and advanced students.
I will provide you with conversational practice. We will talk about things that interest you, whether it is a problem at work, a book you might be reading or a place you’ve recently visited. You can bring along an article, an object or a picture to talk about. I will correct grammar, pronunciation, etc. You will get useful vocabulary as required. 
If you need more than a 'chat' with corrections, then informal tutoring is not the right choice. A structured class designed specifically for a student's needs and interests is the way to go!

pro_course_detail.title: Speak Ukrainian from scratch
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you need Ukrainian language for business communication, education or traveling? 
Do you want to learn a new language and better understand the culture of Ukraine? This course is for you! :-)

This course is an excellent opportunity to learn Ukrainian through discussions and speaking on different issues. I'll ask you a lot of questions in order to encourage you to speak, correct your mistakes when necessary and explain new vocabulary and grammar.

During the lesson we will learn:
- The  Ukrainian alphabet 
- Grammar basics
- Vocabulary
- Listening activities
Every lesson is done according to your needs. Our goal is to make you speak as much as possible.

pro_course_detail.title: General English: Beginner – Intermediate – Advanced
pro_course_detail.description:
If you decide to work with me, then you can expect results. The focus of our lessons will be Speaking so that you'll have more confidence in every situation. 

We will work at your speed. We will work with different tools to take your English language to a new level.

This course includes Speaking, Grammar, Listening, Writing and Reading.

I will help you understand the difference between Past Simple and Present Perfect. Also we will have practice with basic tenses. 

Some examples of popular lesson activities:
- Watching interesting video to find lots of new vocabulary and practice speaking about the related topic.
- Read interesting articles together to improve your listening or help you with your pronunciation (if you are reading)

For best results, I recommend taking 2 or 3 lessons per week. 

See you in class soon!

pro_course_detail.title: Technical English
pro_course_detail.description:
I have an extensive experience in technical English, especially technical translation of different kinds of articles and documents. 
I will teach you how to structure your explanation clearly by using necessary markers.
I will teach you how to be precise as technical writing accuracy is crucial.
I will teach you how to be concise as shorter sentences in technical English is more important.
I will teach you the secrets of passive and active voice. 
This course is designed for students in technical education and for company employees. It covers the skills that students need to communicate successfully in all technical and industrial specializations.
I will prepare motivating texts and clear illustrations. Our topics will reflect the latest developments in technology and will be relevant to your needs. A comprehensive grammar and recording for the listening exercises will be provided. 
I will build up your confidence by presenting need to know background facts on all specialist topics. You will find this course useful and easy to use in your everyday life. You will be able communicate in English at work more confidently and effectively.
See you in class soon!

pro_course_detail.title: RUSSIAN FROM SCRATCH (FOR BEGINNERS/ PRE-INTERMEDIATE/ INTERMEDIATE/ UPPER INTERMEDIATE)
pro_course_detail.description:
Do you need Russian language for business communication, education or traveling? 
Do you want to learn a new language and better understand the culture of Russia and Ukraine? This course is for you! :-)
During the lessons I use student books, but also I create different study materials by myself.
This course is an excellent opportunity to learn Russian through discussions and speaking on different issues. I'll ask you a lot of questions in order to encourage you to speak, correct your mistakes when necessary and explain new vocabulary and grammar.

During the lesson we will learn:
- The Russian alphabet 
- Pronunciation tips
- Grammar basics
- Vocabulary
- Listening activities
*Every lesson is done according to your needs. 
*Our goal is to make you speak as much as possible.
Вам нужен русский язык для делового общения, обучения или путешествий?
Хотите выучить новый язык и лучше понять культуру России и Украины? Этот курс для вас! :-)
На уроках я использую учебники для студентов, а также сама создаю разные материалы для учебы.
Этот курс - отличная возможность выучить русский язык посредством дискуссий и разговоров по разные темам. Я буду задавать вопросы, чтобы побудить вас к разговору, исправлять ошибки при необходимости и объяснять новый слова и грамматику.

Во время урока мы изучим:
- русский алфавит
- тонкости произношени
- основы грамматики
- запас слов
- аудирование
*Каждый урок разрабатывается в соответствии с вашими потребностями. *Наша цель - заставить вас говорить как можно больше.

pro_course_detail.title: RUSSIAN CONVERSATION (РАЗГОВОРНЫЙ РУССКИЙ)
pro_course_detail.description:
This Russian course is created for improving your speaking and listening skills. I will work with students of all levels and ages. You will speak a lot during our lesson and learn new phrases. You will learn different Russian conversations. I will explain you the subtleties of very interesting constructions of Russian language. Russian language is a beautiful and rich in idioms. I will teach you how to use them as well as simple/complicated constructions and words.You will be ready to conduct short and long conversations in Russian by means of my course and your intelligence abilities!:) Schedule a lesson today and we will improve.

Курс русского языка создан для улучшения ваших разговорных и слуховых навыков. Я работаю со студентами всех уровней и возрастов. Во время нашего урока вы будете много говорить и учить новые фразы. Я объясню вам тонкости очень интересных конструкций русского языка. Русский язык красивый и богатый идиомами. Я научу вас как использовать их, а также простые / сложные конструкции и слова. Вы будете готовы вести короткие и длинные диалоги на русском языке с помощью моего курса и ваших интеллектуальных способностей! :) Запланируйте урок сегодня и мы повысим уровень знания Вашего русского языка.

pro_course_detail.description:
I have created this course to help students read Russian original short stories and build their vocabulary and improve reading skills.
You will learn a lot of necessary words just within our lesson. You will learn phrases from different life situations.
This course is appropriate for beginners, intermediate students and it might be useful for advanced students. We will read articles, original and adapted stories, short stories according to your level.

We will choose topics that you enjoy the most, I will correct your mistakes and you will learn new vocabulary and phrases. Schedule a lesson today and we will improve your Russian.

teacher_info.introduction:
Have you already been studying Russian without having any progress in speaking? Or may be you are afraid even to start because of that weird alphabet?
I will make it super simple and comprehensive for you. Let’s break the ice!

I've been teaching languages since 2005.
Here, I offer both formal and informal lessons, it's your choice. Wether you're an absolute beginner, or you need to expand your vocabulary in a specific field, or you already know a lot but still can’t speak, I will be encouraging you lesson by lesson. 

First of all, I'll give you a test to define your proficiency in Russian. Depending on your language level and your goals, we’ll make the program of studies suitable for you.
We’ll start speaking Russian from the very first lesson! Yes, I mean You will start speaking from the very first lesson, too!

You'll get there even faster if you make notes during lessons and dedicate about 20 minutes every day just to read them, without striving to memorize.
Withal, we are not only into speaking practice, but rather into feeling the culture through it.

Также я помогаю изучать английский с нуля, расширять словарный запас и не бояться на нем говорить. 
Please, feel free to schedule a trial lesson with me. We'll talk about your language goals, and you'll discover more details about the learning process. And even if you decide to have lessons with another teacher, you will get:
- clear understanding of your language level,
- a professional advice on how to improve your present knowledge,
- a list of free internet resources that will help you study Russian.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian For the Very Beginners (A1) and Beginners (A2)
pro_course_detail.description:
Check out my Jump-Start Video Course for Beginners (5+ hours):
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLpgpVaWoAiTEF8aNQvPnFCLBrtIeF3tqa
___

My impact is on the Intuitive way of learning Russian: I'll give you the necessary tools by helping you see patterns. I welcome mistakes, because they help you learn. I'm convinced, that the best way of learning is not based on memorizing material, but rather on recognizing and repetition: each of my lessons makes you revise and repeat what you've already learned before, in a slightly different context. My aim is to provide you with information in digestible chunks, and make you sure you don't have any gaps left.
___

A1:

Before taking the course, a student will complete a test that shows his/her knowledge of Russian and gaps in it.
In 20 lessons, we'll cover the very basics of the Russian language and culture. You'll learn the alphabet, rules for reading and pronunciation, simple phrases for everyday conversations, and you'll be introduced to main grammar rules.
By the end of the course, a student should be able to read in Russian, introduce himself to others, understand simple Russian speech and know how various parts of speech are formed.

A2:

Before taking the course, a student will complete a test that shows his/her knowledge of Russian and gaps in it.
In 20 lessons, a student expands the knowledge of Russian language and culture, learning about conjugation of verbs, declension of nouns and pronouns, and is introduced to the diversity and meaning of prefixes in Russian.
By the end of the course, a student should be able to express himself on several topics in everyday conversations, as well as understand Russian speech.

#pronunciation #grammar #conversation #reading #listening #writing #spelling

* 90-minute lessons are held with a 5-minute break.

pro_course_detail.title: The Russian Tourist's Crash Course
pro_course_detail.description:
Check out my Jump-Start Video Course for Beginners (5+ hours):
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLpgpVaWoAiTEF8aNQvPnFCLBrtIeF3tqa
___

My impact is on the Intuitive way of learning Russian: I'll give you the necessary tools by helping you see patterns. I welcome mistakes, because they help you learn. I'm convinced, that the best way of learning is not based on memorizing material, but rather on recognizing and repetition: each of my lessons makes you revise and repeat what you've already learned before, in a slightly different context. My aim is to provide you with information in digestible chunks, and make you sure you don't have any gaps left.

In 40 lessons, we'll cover the essentials of the vocabulary for a tourist in Russia. pro_course_detail.title: Английский с нуля для русскоговорящих (A1-B1)
pro_course_detail.description:
Английский с абсолютного нуля

Если в школе вы учили немецкий или французский (или учили английский, но уже как будто и не учили), а сейчас осознали всю необходимость и преимущества умения свободно разговаривать и понимать английский язык, you are welcome to my classes - добро пожаловать на мой курс. За 20 уроков я очень простым и доступным языком объясню вам основные принципы английской грамматики так, чтобы вы начали говорить на английском и - что самое главное - не боялись, что у вас не получится или что вас не поймут. Кроме того, я поделюсь с вами бесплатными Интернет-ресурсами для изучения английского и расскажу, как сделать обучение более эффективным.
Ко 2-3 уроку вы поймёте, что английский - это совсем не сложно. К концу курса вы научитесь составлять и понимать предложения на английском и сможете участвовать в простых разговорах с англоговорящими.

Английский почти с нуля

Сперва я предложу вам пройти тест, чтобы определить ваш уровень английского. 
Если вам уже знакомы основные правила грамматики, мы разделим обучение на блоки по 5 уроков, каждые из которых будем посвящать отдельной теме (в зависимости от ваших целей). Кроме того, мы будем более углубленно изучать грамматику, чтобы избегать ошибок и говорить чисто. 
К концу курса вы будете более уверенно общаться в различных ситуациях.

#pronunciation #grammar #conversation #reading #listening #writing #spelling

* На уроках продолжительностью 90 минут есть 5-минутные перерывы.

teacher_info.short_signature: My students often say that I'm very patient and systematic :) I've been teaching Russian since 2014.
teacher_info.introduction: Hello! Here are some points which I guess you might be interested to know: 1. Teaching beginners I use English a lot because it’s important to get core ideas across in a clear way. As students become more familiar with understanding Russian, I give instructions in Russian and use English less. 2. Almost after each lesson students are asked to do some homework to practice the material we have studied. You send it to me via e-mail and get corrections before next lesson. We start the lesson with a warm-up and answering questions that you might still have on corrections. 3. I use video Skype and prefer my students to turn on a video option as well because this way we can communicate much better, so please don’t be too shy. 4. I have a bachelor degree in pedagogy and I have a good knowledge of teaching methods. I have TKT (Teaching knowledge test) and CAE (Certificate in advanced English) certificates by Cambridge University. Teaching is a very creative process for me, so I'm looking forward to creative students! 5. Recently I've started a blog for posting some tips and ideas about learning Russian, you may check it on http://norushrussian.blogspot.ru/ Hope you will enjoy it! teacher_info.about_me:
Teaching is a deeply creative process for me and a practice of being in the moment.  ➡️ Very systematic  ➡️Suggested homework  ➡️ A variety of materials used - videos, texts, interviews,etc. ➡️ at your pace. 

I'm a native Russian living now by the Black sea and previously whole life in beautiful Siberia. I’m interested in different things, the most important for me now are reading (popular science - how the brain works; classical literature, modern literature from literary awards shortlists) and contact improvisation (which I also teach in my city).
teacher_info.about_teacher:
Although my teaching experience started a long time ago, I still find teaching a deeply creative process and a practice of being in the moment.
I have a bachelor's degree in pedagogy and a good knowledge of teaching methods. I've been trained to give professional lessons in teaching Russian at Moscow state university. I always prepare my lessons in details but I can easily improvise as well!
Recently I have developed and given the course on teaching Russian as a foreign language to other language teachers. It helped me even more to optimize and clarify the approach that grew out of my practice.
teacher_info.teaching_style: I offer different courses and work with/without textbooks. Teaching beginners, I use English because it’s important to get core ideas across in a clear way but then gradually I give instructions in Russian. Giving new material, I use the 3P method (presentation, practice, production), mnemonics and cultural-historical concepts. Before moving on, I make sure that students have mastered the previous material. Between lessons students do homework to practice new material and get corrections before their next lesson. Having a textbook-based course, I use a book written by one of the best Russian methodists which deals with different aspects of the language. I also use authentic materials.

pro_course_detail.title: Structured course (A1-А2-B1 levels, click for the description)
pro_course_detail.description:
During the years of my teaching practice I have created the effective structured course that is based on best materials developed by different Russian methodists. Every time though the course is individually tailored to every new student.  
On the lesson we work with different aspects of the language and have lots of step-by-step exercises. Students do grammar tasks at home mostly and when we are on-line we have differently organized speaking practice, listen to recordings, answer questions about new material, etc.  

I also use some authentic materials like songs, video extracts and cartoons during this course.

It is an easy access Google file with all you need to have a well-structured lesson (about 1-2 hours) at your own pace with a teacher or on your own. The lesson is made to be interesting for students of A1 and A2 levels. More lessons of different levels (up to C2) can be found with the link inside the sample lesson. 
I will send you the link to the file when you book the lesson. Please contact me if you need more details!

teacher_info.intro: I love learning languages and communicating with people from all over the world. I love traveling and discovering new places and activities. I love spending time in nature, hiking, and camping. I am a dancer (I dance tribal Fusion, Indian dance, Argentine tango, Kizomba, Salsa and others).
teacher_info.introduction: Hello everyone! My name is Alexandra. The biggest part of my life I've lived in Novosibirsk, which is situated in the very heart of Siberia. I also lived for two years in Saint-Petersburg where I studied for my Master's degree in interpretation and translation. I speak fluent English and have intermediate level in French and of course I continue mastering these languages. I've always loved learning foreign languages and communicating with people from other countries. Thanks to my work experience I've had a chance to communicate and make friends with people from France, Canada, England, South Korea, Belgium and Portugal. And what I loved about it is that through one particular person you can experience a whole country, its culture and traditions. I've been teaching English to Russian people for a year now. I also have experience in interpretation and in arrengement of international scientific conferences. I'm here to help you master your spoken Russian. If you are a beginner we'll start with working on your prononciation and learning some basic phrases and if you already speak fluent Russian I'll give you some popular idioms and everyday vocabulary that will help you sound more natiral. And of course I'll tell you everything you'd like to know about Russian culture and everyday life. If it turns out that you share my greatest passion - dancing, we'll have so many things to discuss! I'll be happy to see you at my lessons!
teacher_info.about_me: I love learning languages and communicating with people from all over the world. I love traveling and discovering new places and activities. I love spending time in nature, hiking, and camping. I am a dancer (I dance tribal Fusion, Indian dance, Argentine tango, Kizomba, Salsa and others).
teacher_info.about_teacher:
I am a native speaker of Russian and my main occupation is teaching English to Russian-speaking learners. I also speak French quite fluently. I've been teaching English online for 2.5 years. I have many friends from different countries like England, Canada, France, Belgium, South Korea an so on. I have experience of informal teaching of Russian to my French-speaking friends.
So, as an informal tutor of Russian, I can work with complete beginners (in Russian) who can speak English or French.
I and a friendly, open-minded, attentive and understanding person and teacher.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
During my lessons, I put emphasis on developing speaking and listening skills of my students.
I work with video materials (movies, shows, series, various youtube videos), audio materials (podcasts and my own recordings).
A lesson consists of friendly talk, answering student's questions, work with new material + practice in speaking.

teacher_info.intro: You'll love Russian! Would you like your kid to do so? Only effective methods and engaging exercises! I am not lenient but friendly. You will enjoy working on your Russian. Make the best choice of your summer!

teacher_info.about_teacher: I like using modern teaching technics, building well-structured and engaging lessons. I stick to the 9 classical principles of education: gaining attention, informing the learner of the objective, stimulating recall of prerequisite learned capabilities, presenting the stimulus material, providing learning guidance, eliciting the performance, providing feedback, assessing, enhancing retention and transfer to the job.
teacher_info.teaching_style:
Each of my lessons contains all aspects of studying: speaking, listening, reading and writing for your homework. A ratio of every part depends on your goals: for speaking we'll spend more time talking, for reading - reading out loud, for listening - listening to the real conversations.
Every lesson is going to be a challenge and that is what you need to learn a language.

pro_course_detail.title: А поговорить? (Let's talk!)
pro_course_detail.description:
Вы любите читать? Или петь? Может быть, вам нравится живопись? Давайте поговорим о том, чем вы живете, увлечены, озабочены. Поговорим о культурных различиях и особенностях, традициях, образе жизни. Я объясню, какие фразы уместны, а каких лучше избегать. Вы обогатите свой словарный запас полезными идиомами и общеупотребительными языковыми конструкциями. С нетерпением жду нашей встречи!
What do you like doing in your spare time? What are you keen on? Would you like to know about differences in cultures, traditions, believes, ways of living? Let's talk! I'll help you to rich your vocabulary with useful words, expressions, collocations so you will be able to talk with accuracy and fluency about the topic. I am looking forward to meeting you!

teacher_info.short_signature: Living in Austria I can share my experience with you!
teacher_info.introduction:
Hello, everyone! I'm a passionate professional teacher devoting a lot of time to make my lessons informative, interesting and useful. Currently I'm living in Austria, so I use German a lot! I can teach in English, German, Spanish or Russian.
   I have university diplomas of teaching English and German, I have also passed C1 Goethe exam with excellent marks. My teaching experience is more than 10 years of active work with students of different ages. No two lessons are the same: we can discuss a range of topics enhancing your vocabulary, practise some grammar patterns or I can make an individual step-by-step plan for you to prepare for an international exam successfully. Learning languages is hard work, but it can be fun if you have the right motivation and engaging sources of knowledge. There is not a magical way to learn a language incredibly quickly, but if you are inspired and practise a lot, your results will be rewarding and surprising, believe me! Book a trial lesson and start your way to success now! 

Более 10 лет я специализируюсь на обучении русскоговорящих учеников английскому и немецкому. У меня нет готового плана для каждого, всё индивидуально, и среди множества современных учебных материалов я могу подобрать для Вас те, которые подходят к Вашим целям и интересам. Часто путешествую, сейчас живу в Австрии, обучу Вас живому языку общения. Есть успешный опыт подготовки учеников к IELTS, TOEFL, FCE, CAE, Goethe Zertifikat, TestDaF. Если у Вас есть цель, но немножко не хватает вдохновения и советов, как достичь совершенства через практику - обращайтесь ко мне!

teacher_child_tag.full_name: Test of English as a Foreign Language

course_info.trial_description: During a trial lesson we can get to know each other, talk a bit, discuss your goals and ways to achieve desired aims.

pro_course_detail.title: English (Beginner-Advanced, A1-C1): Conversation Practice, Grammar, Exam Preparation etc
pro_course_detail.description: Speaking classes, grammar explanation, preparing for international exams (IELTS, TOEFL, FCE, CAE). I use modern textbooks, make a plan for every student and provide a flexible approach for all needs.

pro_course_detail.title: Deutsch (A1-C1): Konversation / Grammatik / Prüfungsvorbereitung
pro_course_detail.description: A German course tailored to your interests and objectives. I use a variety of books published in Germany. Besides, I can teach you Austrian peculiarities or just conversational German as I'm currently living in Austria and I use German every day. I have a C1 Goethe certificate, I have successful experience of preparing students for this exam + I can share my own experience.

pro_course_detail.title: Russian for foreigners
pro_course_detail.description: A Russian course for foreigners: as a native speaker I can teach you conversational phrases or explain grammar.
